title: Mascot Books Publishes Christmas Holiday: CD and Song Book By Alexander Ceruzzi
text:

SOURCE Alexander Ceruzzi
HERNDON, Va. , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Mascot Books announces the release of Christmas Holiday: CD and Song Book , written by Alexander Ceruzzi .
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277260
"Never let the feeling go, It's Christmas time again."
Christmas Holiday: CD and Song Book will be released on November 7 th , 2015. The CD and Song Book will include eight original Christmas songs on a separate CD beginning with the 2014 Song Of The Year-honored "Christmas Holiday," followed by "Dear Santa Claus," a song about a young child who writes Santa a letter that he has been good all year long and deserves toys on Santa's big sleigh. However, having seen poverty and lack of liberty on his TV, the child has a sudden change of heart and tells Santa to give away his Christmas toys to other unfortunate girls and boys.
In addition to the original Christmas songs, which are about all facets of the Christmas season, the lyrics and beautiful illustrations that represent each song will certainly get children and readers of all ages in the holiday spirit. Merry Christmas!
Alexander Ceruzzi , The Melody Man, was born in Port Chester, New York . His musical career began at age four with accordion lessons. He developed into a jazz musician and graduated from Eastern Kentucky University with a Bachelor and Master's Degree in Music Education. He taught vocal and instrumental music at the high school level in Illinois and Iowa. Born with a rare musical gift known as perfect pitch, Alex can identify notes, chords, and key signatures as he listens to a piece of music without seeing the actual notes. His written music includes rhythm and blues, country, gambling, patriotic, Christian, and Christmas. Alex has received Song of the Year honors for "Dumpster Diving" (2010), "One More Time" (2013), "Christmas Holiday" (2014), and "Jesus Forgive Me" (2015).
For more information regarding Christmas Holiday: CD and Song Book , please contact Mary Anne Ceruzzi through Email or MelodyManMusic.com . Phone number: 770-876-4685
Review copies will be available upon request.
Christmas Holiday: CD and Song Book is registered with the American Wholesale Book Company, Baker & Taylor, Follett Library Resources, Ingram , and Partners Book distributors and available online with the following retailers: MelodyManMusic.com , Mascot Books , Barnes and Noble , Amazon , Books-A-Million .
